name: Hot Spud
description:
Hot Spud is a mashup of ideas from Breakout and Pinball machines with high score mechanics inspired by Geometry Wars. 

This demo of the game features two adventures that contain different stages, and completely different looking bricks within. It is fully functional, but there are some rough edges to it at this stage and some missing audio (but there's still a lot of sound effects present.) There is a "how to play" menu in the game that explains the controls and general game rules. I will write information about all of the available powerups soon.

The game saves after each stage is completed so you can leave and resume the adventures any time. There will be leaderboards at the end of the adventure eventually, but these are not yet built.

Please let me know if you have any feedback, or if you enjoyed this game! Thank you and have fun :).
